article_text: Federal prosecutors say several South Florida companies inflated building costs to bilk the U.S. government for higher subsidies in a complex scheme that diverted money from projects for the poor.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carlisle Development Group, Biscayne Housing Group, affordable housing, fraud, Greer, Boggio, Cox, DeRamon, IRS
